body_html:
thanks for the stacktrace. I couldn't get much signal from it.
One thing that'd help is, set a breakpoint for throw in gdb using catch throw, and then run your script. If an exception is thrown by the QApplication call, it'll then be obvious.
body_text:
thanks for the stacktrace. I couldn't get much signal from it.
One thing that'd help is, set a breakpoint for throw in gdb using catch throw, and then run your script. If an exception is thrown by the QApplication call, it'll then be obvious.
body:
thanks for the stacktrace. I couldn't get much signal from it.
One thing that'd help is, set a breakpoint for `throw` in gdb using `catch throw`, and then run your script. If an exception is thrown by the QApplication call, it'll then be obvious.
